Container.Name: turing-smart-screen
Container.Overview:
FR: Statistiques monitorées vers écran compatibles. Le projet turing-smart-screen en container Docker. Plus d'informations sur les écrans compatibles et la configuration sur le github du projet: https://github.com/mathoudebine/turing-smart-screen-python
EN: Monitor statistics on compatibles screens. Project turing-smart-screen in Docker. More informations about material compatibility and settings on the github's project link: https://github.com/mathoudebine/turing-smart-screen-python
Setup: - setup variables and mapping - don't forget to modify the device name of your screen (see result of command dmesg just after connecting your screen) - if you need to add an nvidia GPU set same variables as Plex/emby/Jellyfin to work with
Start: Look at the console if your screen didn't work.
Customization: you will find on the /app's mapped folder the source of the project. On the res/ folder you will find a themes/ folder container some themes. You can take the name of a folder inside /app/res/themes and set it up to the THEME variable.

Config.Name: /dev/ttyACM0
Config.Description: Your screen device. Found it by connecting it and see just after the result of this console command: dmesg

Config.Name: THEME
Config.Description: The name of the theme. Must be the name of one subfolder of /app/res/themes.

Config.Name: ETHERNET_INTERFACE
Config.Description: The name of the ethernet interface.

Config.Name: DISPLAY_REVERSE
Config.Description: If true the video result will be in landscape mode
